- The relevant columns are "location attendance" because it tells us both where the game was held and how many people attended.

- Location: pepsi center
- Attendance: 15823
This is below 19000. So this already makes the claim false because not all Pepsi Center games had over 19000 attendance.

- Location: united center → Not Pepsi, skip.

- Location: pepsi center
- Attendance: 19141 → This is above 19000.

- Location: pepsi center
- Attendance: 16446 → Below 19000. Another instance where attendance didn't meet the claim.
